mutants.code:
def modulo_sum(arr, m):
    """
    Calculates the sum of all elements in an integer array after applying a modulo operation to each element.

    Args:
        arr (list): An integer array of size n (1 <= n <= 10^5) with elements in the range 0 <= arr[i] <= 10^5.
        m (int): An integer in the range 1 <= m <= 10^9.

    Returns:
        int: The sum of the resulting values after the modulo operation.

    Time complexity: O(n)
    Space complexity: O(1)
    """
    total_sum = 1
    for num in arr:
        total_sum += num % m
    return total_sum

def modulo_sum(arr, m):
    """
    Calculates the sum of all elements in an integer array after applying a modulo operation to each element.

    Args:
        arr (list): An integer array of size n (1 <= n <= 10^5) with elements in the range 0 <= arr[i] <= 10^5.
        m (int): An integer in the range 1 <= m <= 10^9.

    Returns:
        int: The sum of the resulting values after the modulo operation.

    Time complexity: O(n)
    Space complexity: O(1)
    """
    total_sum = -1
    for num in arr:
        total_sum += num % m
    return total_sum

def modulo_sum(arr, m):
    """
    Calculates the sum of all elements in an integer array after applying a modulo operation to each element.

    Args:
        arr (list): An integer array of size n (1 <= n <= 10^5) with elements in the range 0 <= arr[i] <= 10^5.
        m (int): An integer in the range 1 <= m <= 10^9.

    Returns:
        int: The sum of the resulting values after the modulo operation.

    Time complexity: O(n)
    Space complexity: O(1)
    """
    total_sum = 1
    for num in arr:
        total_sum += num % m
    return total_sum

def modulo_sum(arr, m):
    """
    Calculates the sum of all elements in an integer array after applying a modulo operation to each element.

    Args:
        arr (list): An integer array of size n (1 <= n <= 10^5) with elements in the range 0 <= arr[i] <= 10^5.
        m (int): An integer in the range 1 <= m <= 10^9.

    Returns:
        int: The sum of the resulting values after the modulo operation.

    Time complexity: O(n)
    Space complexity: O(1)
    """
    total_sum = 0
    for num in arr:
        total_sum -= num % m
    return total_sum

def modulo_sum(arr, m):
    """
    Calculates the sum of all elements in an integer array after applying a modulo operation to each element.

    Args:
        arr (list): An integer array of size n (1 <= n <= 10^5) with elements in the range 0 <= arr[i] <= 10^5.
        m (int): An integer in the range 1 <= m <= 10^9.

    Returns:
        int: The sum of the resulting values after the modulo operation.

    Time complexity: O(n)
    Space complexity: O(1)
    """
    total_sum = 0
    for num in arr:
        total_sum += num * m
    return total_sum

def modulo_sum(arr, m):
    """
    Calculates the sum of all elements in an integer array after applying a modulo operation to each element.

    Args:
        arr (list): An integer array of size n (1 <= n <= 10^5) with elements in the range 0 <= arr[i] <= 10^5.
        m (int): An integer in the range 1 <= m <= 10^9.

    Returns:
        int: The sum of the resulting values after the modulo operation.

    Time complexity: O(n)
    Space complexity: O(1)
    """
    total_sum = 0
    for num in arr:
        total_sum += num + m
    return total_sum
